content.tittle: Hello, my name is Maria Clara Amorim
content.sobre: - I am a web developer with a focus on Frontend. With a technical degree in Informatics from the Federal Institute of Bahia (IFBA), I combine a solid technical foundation with creativity to build modern and efficient applications. My experience includes working with technologies such as ReactJS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, always aiming to deliver solutions that add value and provide an excellent user experience.
portfolio.descricao1: These are some of the public commercial projects I've worked on
portfolio.descricao2: These are some of my favorite personal projects I've worked on
portfolio.dantas: This is a complete e-commerce website for selling bicycles and bicycle accessories. Developed by me and a team of frontend and backend developers.
footer: All rights reserved. Made by Maria Clara Amorim
